meanings.definition: A session of physical exercise or training.
meanings.sent1: I had a workout at the gym yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She always feels energized after a good workout.
meanings.sent3: After his workout, he felt like he could conquer the world.
meanings.sent4: Her determination during the workout was like a roaring lion.
meanings.sent5: The workout left her muscles feeling alive and strong.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in physical activity to improve health or fitness.
meanings.sent1: Regular workout helps keep your body healthy.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys going for a morning workout in the park.
meanings.sent3: His workout routine became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The workout of dedication and perseverance paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The workout of commitment and hard work led to great results.
